name: Horticulture
description: Within Agriculture, Horticulture is the study of horticultural technology and management, floriculture, greenhouse methods, nursery management, and landscape gardening. It includes the laying out and construction of urban and domestic parks and gardens.

name: Floriculture
description: A branch of horticulture concerned with the cultivation of flowering and ornamental plants for gardens and for floristry, comprising the floral industry.

name: Gardening
description: The practice of growing and cultivating plants as part of horticulture, whether for ornamental purposes or food production in a horticultural context.

name: Green keeping
description: The maintenance of turf grass, especially on golf courses, a specialization within Horticulture.

name: Horticultural techniques
description: The various methods and practices used in the cultivation of horticultural crops, including fruits, vegetables, flowers, and ornamental plants.

name: Nursery management
description: The business and practice of propagating and growing plants in a nursery for sale or for use in landscaping and gardening, a part of Horticulture.

name: Turf cultivation
description: The growing and maintenance of grass for lawns, sports fields, and other recreational areas, a specialized area of Horticulture.
